sentences: Tema nimi kuttab meelde tema eestlaseid.
Ta on alati valmis sõbra abiks kutsuma.
Ära kutsa teda lihtsalt enda meelde.
context: 'kuttab' means to call or invite someone, usually implying a request for the person to come. It is often used in social contexts where one individual summons another to join them either physically or metaphorically.
